data.text: @nz_cate I know, it's just so wrong these mandates in care homes. It's so cruel 💔

@NMadeinNZ At that age why vaccinate? 
Itâ€™s like giving an 85 year old a mammogram. If they have cancer, chemo will kill them. Better to live with it.

@NMadeinNZ @avocato_bob Oh but Jacinda here wants to go further. No one should die. Ever. With COVID or on a road. They should die by their own hand, in private, away from media and front page where she can safely ignore them and their families so her worldwide image is not maligned!
